first_translate: I want  us to go out together...
it’s just going to be him and me...
wait... how did you get here?!

hangle: 보통 황족들은 몰래 만들어 놓은 비밀통로로 빠져나오잖아?
first_translate: well, don’t members of royal families usually use secret passages when they leave their homes?
at least that's what I've seen in movies or novels.

hangle: 멀쩡한 입구를 두고 왜 그래야 하는데.
first_translate: but why would he need one if there are normal exits available?

hangle: 혹시 비밀 호위 같은 것도 데리고 왔어?
first_translate: do you have any bodyguards following you around today?
let’s stop talking about weird stuff now. shall we head off?

hangle: 저 녀석은 엉뚱한 생각만 하고 있군…
first_translate: that guy is always thinking strange things...
and yet someone else thought this was a date and couldn’t sleep last night because she was so excited.
the festival looks bigger than expected.
there are lots of people too...
if we lose each other here, finding our way back will be difficult.

hangle: 데이트도 아닌데 손 정도는 잡아도 되겠지?
first_translate: can I hold your hand even though this isn’t technically a date?
you’re not holding my hand properly.

hangle: 시그렌, 어릴 때나 했던 일이라 별로야?
first_translate: isn’t this something only kids do, siegren?

hangle: 너와 손을 잡는 건 문제가 아냐, 피오나.
first_translate: my problem has nothing to do with whose hands I’m holding, fiona.

hangle: 시그렌이 이해가 안 가는 말을 하긴 해도
first_translate: even though siegren says some pretty confusing things sometimes,
I think festivals can actually be quite fun.
oh, look at her! such a cute lady!
stuff like this happens as well.
if you’re by yourself, then perhaps we could take a stroll through the market together--

hangle: 의외로 난 수도에서 먹히는 얼굴인가 봐.
first_translate: maybe I'm more popular than I thought.
back in hailon, no one liked me!

hangle: 인기 없게 만든 범인 중 하나
first_translate: one of those responsible for making me unpopular

hangle: 시그렌, 저기서 뭔가 하는 것 같아.
first_translate: something seems to be happening over there, siegren.
siegren’s mother used to be a songstress, didn’t she?

hangle: 시그렌도 축제를 즐기고 있는 것 같아.
first_translate: it appears siegren is enjoying himself at the festival too.
be careful getting down from the carriage.
I won’t be able to watch if you keep wobbling like that.

hangle: 아까 말해 준다는 거, 아직 말 안 해줬어. 손잡는 거 말이야.
first_translate: remember earlier when you said you’d explain something to me? regarding holding hands.
how am I supposed to understand what you meant by saying “the problem is myself”?

hangle: 이제는 신분도 달라졌으니, 그 부분이 곤란한 걸까?
first_translate: now that your status changed, is that causing problems for you somehow?

hangle: 지금 들으면 자고 일어나서 까먹을 것 같은데.
first_translate: I feel like I might forget everything after waking up tomorrow morning.
unlike you, whenever I grab your hand,
all sorts of thoughts come into my head.
